summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021 discussing the request for spreadsheets, possibly related to trial exhibit material for the Epstein case. The communication involves FBI personnel and indicates an external sender warning.

persons.name: Byrne
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email forwarding a request for spreadsheets, indicating coordination on a project possibly related to trial exhibits.

events.title: Email Request for Spreadsheets
events.description: An email exchange regarding the request for spreadsheets, potentially for trial exhibit material, with a follow-up asking if the material was already sent.

keyFacts: The email chain discusses obtaining spreadsheets, possibly for trial exhibit material related to the Epstein case.
The communication includes an external sender warning, indicating caution about phishing attempts.
The correspondence suggests ongoing preparation or coordination for legal proceedings as of October 2021.
